original: Sukhasahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: sukha sahagatam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sukha sahagataḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nasukhasahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na sukha sahagatam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sukha sahagataḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhasahagataṁ kusalañca nasukhasahagataṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā sukha sahagatam kusalam ca na sukha sahagatam kusalañca dhamma

original: paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: paṭicca na sukha sahagataḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Sukhasahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: sukha sahagatam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sukha sahagataḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nasukhasahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na sukha sahagatam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sukha sahagataḥ na akusalaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhasahagataṁ akusalañca nasukhasahagataṁ akusalañca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sukha sahagatam akusalam ca na sukha sahagatam akusalam ca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sukha sahagataḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi
pe avigate tīṇi abyākata mūlam paccaya vasena
